item.title: HTB UNI CTF : Web Slippy
item.description: Analyze For this challenge we were given the source file of the site, looking at the website we can see that it wants a tar.gz file as the input. The directory tree of the source code as follow. ./challenge ├── application │ ├── blueprints │ │ └── routes.py │ ├── config.py │ ├── main.py │ ├── static │ │ ├── archives │ │ ├── css │ │ │ ├── bootstrap.
